generalCompute.title: General Compute

highPerformanceStorage.title: High-Performance Storage
highPerformanceStorage.subtitle: High-Performance Storage Products
highPerformanceStorage.description: High-performance storage servers providing high-speed, high-performance data storage access, suitable for large-scale data analysis, high-performance computing, cloud computing, and large-scale database management

generalStorage.title: General Storage
generalStorage.subtitle: General Storage Products
generalStorage.description: General-purpose storage servers suitable for large-scale data processing and storage scenarios, meeting large capacity, scalability, and high-availability storage needs

ibSwitch.title: IB Switch
ibSwitch.subtitle: InfiniBand Switch
ibSwitch.description: InfiniBand switches are typically used in high-performance computing (HPC), data centers, cloud computing, and large-scale storage fields to meet high-performance computing and data transmission requirements. In recent years, they have become the preferred network interconnect technology for GPU servers

ethernetSwitch.title: Ethernet Switch
ethernetSwitch.subtitle: Ethernet Switch
ethernetSwitch.description: Transmits data based on Ethernet, connecting various servers with network firewalls, routers, and other network devices to achieve interconnection of all devices; applied to enterprise networks, carrier networks, data center networks, and industrial network scenarios

serviceScope.title: Service Scope
serviceScope.coverage: More than 40 service outlets in 31 provinces (municipalities directly under the Central Government/autonomous regions) across the country, as well as Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan regions
serviceScope.primaryCities: First-level spare parts cities: Beijing, Shanghai, Shenzhen, Guangzhou, Wuhan, Chengdu, Tianjin, Qingdao, Hangzhou, etc.
serviceScope.secondaryCities: Second-level spare parts cities: Hefei, Nanjing, Yizheng, Changshu, Suqian, Nantong, Heyuan, Qingyuan, Shenyang, Langfang, Sanhe, Ulanqab, Huailai, Xiamen, Lingqiu, Hohhot, Zhongwei, etc.
serviceScope.otherCities: Spare parts transfer: For non-key spare parts in other cities, transfer will be made through nearby cities
serviceScope.hkMacauTaiwan: Hong Kong, Macao and Taiwan: Local service team independent spare parts warehouse

warranty.title: Warranty Period
warranty.point1: The warranty period starts from the date of first purchase of the product ("purchase date"), and the purchase date is subject to the invoice date of the purchased product. If there is no valid invoice, the warranty period will start from the date of product receipt.
warranty.point2: If the product invoice date is later than the actual delivery date of the product, the warranty period will start from the date of product receipt. If the delivery note date cannot be verified, the date of server manufacture recorded by SUPERCORE shall prevail.

supercore.title: SUPERCORE
supercore.subtitle: AI-driven, Reconstructing Enterprise Intelligent Productivity
supercore.address: ROOM 701 UNIT 108 7/F TOWER B NEW MANDARIN PLAZA 14 SCIENCE MUSEUM ROAD TSIM SHA TSUI KL
supercore.addressEn: ROOM 701 UNIT 108 7/F TOWER B NEW MANDARIN PLAZA 14 SCIENCE MUSEUM ROAD TSIM SHA TSUI KL
supercore.description: SUPERCORE is a global leading AI computing infrastructure service provider, focusing on the R&D, production and full-stack solution delivery of AI servers and GPU computing clusters. With "AI-driven, reconstructing enterprise intelligent productivity" as its core mission, it provides high-performance and highly reliable computing bases for global enterprises. SUPERCORE cooperates with the world's top IDC service providers and cloud manufacturers to provide deployment and operation and maintenance services for AI supercomputing clusters.
supercore.mission: SUPERCORE always uses "technology + service" two-wheel drive to enable enterprises to efficiently obtain the core productivity of the AI era.
